MOTD
MAKEUP OF THE DAY

24DEC

One point with glitter!

Glitter is essential during the year-end season, which holds various gatherings.

DEC 24 2018

One point with glitter!

Glitter is essential during the year-end season, which holds various gatherings. If you add glitter to daily makeup, you can express a holiday season makeup look. “Metallic Eye Glitter” #style icon can be applied on the under eye area and can be used singly like shadow. Take a small amount of #Style Icon with a brush, evenly apply on skin around the eyes, and lightly tap the center of the eye for close adherence -- rose-toned glitter eye makeup is complete!

  1. 20DEC

    The color of my closely adhering foundation?

    Still haven’t found closely adhering foundation that’s perfect for your skin? Pro Tailor Foundation BeGlow is a product that made many foundation users settle with various colors that are perfect for Asian skin tone, along with naturally glowing radiance.

    DEC 20 2018

    The color of my closely adhering foundation?

    Still haven’t found closely adhering foundation that’s perfect for your skin? Pro Tailor Foundation BeGlow is a product that made many foundation users settle with various colors that are perfect for Asian skin tone, along with naturally glowing radiance. It can express makeup that seems to wrap skin even during the dry season due to the feature of close adherence. In particular, the soft, neutral color suitable for Asian skin tone expresses pretty makeup for any skin tone.

  2. 18DEC

    Holiday Glitter

    eSpoir’s best eye shadow sequin produces deep, splendidly sparkling eye makeup with one color.

    DEC 18 2018

    Holiday Glitter

    eSpoir’s best eye shadow sequin produces deep, splendidly sparkling eye makeup with one color. Her Holiday color is back as metallic eye glitter in dramatically sparkling liquid type in the 2018 holiday season. Complete moist, splendidly sparkling eye makeup with metallic eye glitter #Her Holiday color this holiday season.

  3. 13DEC

    Lip plumping completed in 10 seconds!

    If you want to have wrinkle-free, supple, voluminous lips, try Lip Plumping Potion.

    DEC 13 2018

    Lip plumping completed in 10 seconds!

    If you want to have wrinkle-free, supple, voluminous lips, try Lip Plumping Potion. Upon lightly applying on the lips, a pleasantly tingling sensation and a temporary warm feeling restores the vitality of the lips by promoting the blood circulation of the lips and producing plump, supple lips instantly while improving the moisture and elasticity of dry lips. You will have very attractive, healthy lips with Lip Plumping Potion that provides instant volume to the lips in 10 seconds as if having received filler treatment.

  4. 11DEC

    One glitter completes EOTD

    As if containing sunset glow, undulating on water, softly sparkling Vaseline-shine eye shadow “Sunset” color is back with metallic eye glitter in liquid type that will shine more dramatically in the 2018 holiday season.

    DEC 11 2018

    One glitter completes EOTD

    As if containing sunset glow, undulating on water, softly sparkling Vaseline-shine eye shadow “Sunset” color is back with metallic eye glitter in liquid type that will shine more dramatically in the 2018 holiday season. Lightly touch your eyes with the tip brush enclosed in the metallic eye glitter and tap with your fingertips as a finishing touch. Softly sparkling color will express eye makeup that glows at any angle.

  5. 07DEC

    Coloration A+, Usage A+

    We would like to introduce lip & blush makeup color pencil No Wear Odd Pencil #A+ Red color that colors softly with a freestyle color sketch.

    DEC 07 2018

    Coloration A+, Usage A+

    We would like to introduce lip & blush makeup color pencil No Wear Odd Pencil #A+ Red color that colors softly with a freestyle color sketch. The vintage-tone red color closely adheres to any skin type! Unique Brick Red will increase the score of your makeup! Complete your own special ODD makeup with Odd Pencil A+ Red color this season.

  6. 05DEC

    Moisturizing care of your dried lips!

    If your lip condition is bad, even pretty lipstick color will not look beautiful.

    DEC 05 2018

    Moisturizing care of your dried lips!

    If your lip condition is bad, even pretty lipstick color will not look beautiful. Keep your lip condition healthy with Lip Healing Potion that will fill your dry, tender lips with comfortable moisture. The gentle 5-free formula, which does not include artificial fragrance or synthetic colorant, can be used safely for sensitive skin; the non-sticky melting balm texture provides a synergistic effect when matched with various lip products. During the dry season, experience healing with Lip Healing Potion by applying on tired lips, which reveal your condition instantly.

  7. 03DEC

    Perfect combination to overcome the cold weather

    We would like to introduce perfect combination items that will save skin from dryness and flaky texture.

    DEC 03 2018

    Perfect combination to overcome the cold weather

    We would like to introduce perfect combination items that will save skin from dryness and flaky texture. During the winter season, which makes skin feel taut even, if you experience flaky makeup, resolve your problem with the combination of Skin Glow Water and Pro Tailor Foundation Be glow. If you want to produce moisturizing foundation base in busy mornings, add 2~3 drops of Skin Glow Water to Pro Tailor Foundation Be glow. You can have oasis-glowing skin that does not dry easily even in the cold winter.

What is the door drop service?

  • If online sold-out products are in stock at offline stores, the service delivers the goods ordered by customers when they make payment online.
